name: ABISprotocol
tagline: protocol concept to enable decentralization and expansion of a giving economy and a new social good
body:
### Welcome to ABISprotocol.

We have launched an indiegogo campaign to fund our Plan of Action.  Go [here](http://igg.me/at/microdonations-using-cryptocurrencies) to help us out!

_Our Supporters:_

[Cryptostorm](https://cryptostorm.is/)

[Mondo Cellars](http://mondocellars.com/)

[RMM](http://rockymountainminers.com/)

_others to be added soon_
